titleStmt.title: A letter of General George Monck's, dated at Leicester 23 Ian. and directed unto Mr. Rolle to be communicated unto the rest of the gentry of Devon: occasioned by a late letter from the gentry of Devon dated at Execter 14 Ian. and sent by Mr. Bampfield to the Speaker to be communicated unto the Parliament. Read in Parliament Ian. 26.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Iohn Redmayn in Lovels Court in Pater noster row,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 27. 1659"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Lovels Court in Pater noster row
